name: Panda Must Jump Twice
description:
The creators of Hardest Game Ever 2 offers you a frustratingly cute game — Panda Must Jump Twice!

Help the students accomplish their dreams to become KungFu Masters!
Jump from pole to pole by tapping once or twice.
Clear all obstacles to attain the highest belt!
Collect coins along the way to recruit more students to join your KungFu Temple!
Will you help them or shatter their dreams?
